name: cacheviz
description: Interactive web-based visualizer for comparing cache mapping functions: Direct Mapped, Set-Associative, and Fully Associative

scripts.dev: bun run build && (bun build src/app.ts --outdir dist --watch & bun run --watch src/server.ts)
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && bun build src/app.ts --outdir dist --minify && cp src/index.html dist/ && bunx lightningcss --minify src/styles.css -o dist/styles.css
